attributes.contentHtml:
Hello NotEthan,

How does they scammed you? Is there any losses on you? We suggest you to file a report at your local police station.

Best Regards,
AllSafe

AllSafe
hello AllSafe,

What i meant was they are scamming us aka thier members. There was no losses on mine but does NOT MEAN i wont expose fake hosts as i know that many others are. They are inviting and they are getting lied on, I tried talking with the owner but he wont stop...
its not me i am worried about my friend.. its the members of thier host who still thinks that this scam host (nixxon) is gonna release
i am doing my own diging on this scam host and owner's previous hosts to find if he owned any other FAKE hosts or SMP.
All We want is to give everyone a better place and not let these scammers....
And btw they were advertising a SMP on there so i highly understand What they are doing...

Ur friendly (not if ur scamming or are a scammer)
Ethan!
